duration_raw: until the start of your next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 7" pfs="Standard">
[True Target](/Spells.aspx?ID=1726)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Prediction" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=132" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 364 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Bifrons](/Deities.aspx?ID=525), [Cihua Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=413), [Demon Bringers](/Deities.aspx?ID=230), [Fortune's Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=378), [Kaldemash](/Deities.aspx?ID=349), [Reymenda](/Deities.aspx?ID=482), [Rokoga Gin](/Deities.aspx?ID=629), [Skrymir](/Deities.aspx?ID=496)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 4 creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the start of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You delve into the possible futures of the next few seconds to understand all the ways your foe might avoid harm, then cast out that vision to those around you. Designate a creature. The first time each target makes an attack roll against that creature during _true target's_ duration, the attacker rolls twice and uses the better result. The attacker also ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the designated creature being [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22).
name: True Target

**Traditions**

**Deities**
[Bifrons](/Deities.aspx?ID=525), [Cihua Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=413), [Demon Bringers](/Deities.aspx?ID=230), [Fortune's Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=378), [Kaldemash](/Deities.aspx?ID=349), [Reymenda](/Deities.aspx?ID=482), [Rokoga Gin](/Deities.aspx?ID=629), [Skrymir](/Deities.aspx?ID=496)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Target** 4 creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the start of your next turn
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make multiple attacks against a creature especially accurate.
</summary>
summary: Make multiple attacks against a creature especially accurate.

text: True Target Single Action Source Player Core pg. 364 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Bifrons, Cihua Coatl, Demon Bringers, Fortune's Fate, Kaldemash, Reymenda, Rokoga Gin, Skrymir Range 60 feet Target 4 creatures Duration until the start of your next turn --- You delve into the possible futures of the next few seconds to understand all the ways your foe might avoid harm, then cast out that vision to those around you. Designate a creature. The first time each target makes an attack roll against that creature during true target's duration, the attacker rolls twice and uses the better result. The attacker also ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the designated creature being concealed or hidden.
